      • drawChild

        public void drawChild(ScrollLayout parent,
                      android.view.View child,
                      android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                      int scrollOrientation,
                      int index,
                      long drawingTime)
        从接口复制的说明: IDrawChildren
        绘制子控件
        指定者:
        drawChild 在接口中 IDrawChildren
        参数:
        parent - ScrollLayout
        child - 需要绘制的View
        canvas - 未经处理
        scrollOrientation - ScrollLayout.scrollOrientation
        index - child在ScrollLayout.children中的位置
        drawingTime - use in ViewGroup.drawChild(Canvas, View, long)
